entry.title: The Witcher 3 is not an RPG

media:group.media:title: The Witcher 3 is not an RPG
media:group.media:description:
This is most certainly my most controversial video to date...
Despite being a few months late, this video was rushed to get out way ahead of Cyberpunk - probably will end up all being for naught when it gets delayed until 2022.
If I made any mistakes, be sure to let me know in the comments.
Daggerfall Unity: https://www.dfworkshop.net/
All of The Witcher 3's Side Quests: https://witcher.fandom.com/wiki/The_Witcher_3_secondary_quests
Contents: Introduction - 00:00 The History of RPGs - 4:26 So What Exactly is an RPG? - 16:59 Character Progression/Combat - 20:16 Open World Design - 23:38 Character Leveling - 27:05 Quest Design - 29:30 Story Decisions - 34:12 The "36" Endings - 39:37 The DLCs - 43:24 Conclusion - 46:05

entry.title: Sadie Adler is a Mary Sue

media:group.media:title: Sadie Adler is a Mary Sue
media:group.media:description:
The nicest thing I can say about Sadie is that she has a nice ass.
Contents: Introduction - 00:00 Preamble - 00:15 Sadie's Story - 6:42 Reflection - 45:52 Real Life Female Outlaws - 50:21 The Video Will End Soon, I Swear! - 1:01:30
Below I will list various citations and thoughts in regard to the video in chronological order.
RDR2 is a disappointment my almost every metric (I will confess that I think hunting is fun, but there’s never an actual incentive to do it because missions give you too much money.) My comment on the graphics will most likely get some pushback, so let me explain what I mean (based on my experience with the PC versions). RDR2 is most certainly a more striking game than GTA5, but after careful examination, I believe that GTA is a clear winner in terms of actual detail. RDR2 has excellent distant LODs, but both textures and geometric detail fail to surpass GTA5. Most effects that contribute to RDR2’s graphical makeup already existed in GTA5 (volumetric lighting, variable shadow softness, water reactiveness [yes, actually]), even though they were used more conservatively. I’m not saying that RDR2 is a bad looking game, but it’s disappointing compared to GTA5, especially when taking into note GTA5’s last gen roots.
It’s highly unlikely that a woman would somehow find herself at the top of the hierarchy of STEM-excelling, criminals in city like Los Angeles. Bellow are a few links that support my case, both are from Wikipedia, which unfortunately has some editorialization, but they’ll do: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_differences_in_crime https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Women_in_STEM_fields#North_America
Here’s the rabbit hole to American Krogan’s video on RDR2’s politics: https://www.bitchute.com/video/5opFTQmh3cZ3/ I disagree with a few things he says, such at his conclusion that ALL the blame for the failure of Dutch’s ideology is passed from Dutch to Micah (there’re a few instances where Thumby makes it clear that Dutch is the one to blame by having various characters refer to Dutch as having a ‘God Complex’). Also, there’s this one part where he shows a picture of the Wild Bunch Gang as a representation of the Pinkertons. I don’t support all American Krogan’s opinions, but I do support all of his facts.
I don’t feel the need to post links I used for the 40%ers part. Just google ‘transgender woman wins at X sport’ and you’ll find something without too much trouble.
Here’s a few links about Women’s suffrage: https://educationpost.org/the-suffragettes-were-not-allies-to-black-women-they-were-racist/ https://www.telegraph.co.uk/women/womens-life/11914757/Racism-and-the-suffragettes-the-uncomfortable-truth.html I’m not entirely sure to what degree the suffragettes were more racists than the average white southerner, but my point is more so that intersectionality is a lie. It’s more than possible that the various ‘oppressed groups’ will end up oppressing each other given the chance.
My choice of music at any given moment reflects how seriously I take what’s going on.
Random site that conveys the commonly held knowledge than men are stronger than women: https://www.livestrong.com/article/509536-muscular-strength-in-women-compared-to-men/
When Guys Hit Back: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bk5xYc09Mos&t=10s
Video I pulled cringey comments praising Sadie from: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCyNwxwZTF4
Dr. Phil source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-9omkdPGNmo He obviously wasn’t (directly) referring to people who think that Sadie Adler is a real character.
Good, the Bad, and the Ugly clip: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JrYtD7gSWsI
Female outlaws sources: https://owlcation.com/humanities/10-Notorious-Female-Outlaws-from-the-Wild-West https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pearl_Hart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laura_Bullion http://shipwrecklibrary.com/deadlands/belle-siddons/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rose_Dunn https://tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/fsc33 https://www.amazon.com/Sallie-Scull-Texas-frontier-Phantoms/dp/B0007EGU0I https://www.worldcat.org/title/sallie-scull-on-the-texas-frontier-phantoms-on-rio-turbio/oclc/2675135 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Nose_Kate https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belle_Starr https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Etta_Place https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleanor_Dumont https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonnie_and_Clyde
Charles Murray’s Human Diversity : The Biology of Gender, Race, and Class: https://www.amazon.com/Human-Diversity-Biology-Gender-Class/dp/1538744015?SubscriptionId=AKIAILSHYYTFIVPWUY6Q&tag=duckduckgo-d-20&linkCode=xm2&camp=2025&creative=165953&creativeASIN=1538744015 Highly recommended read. Another good source: https://sites.google.com/site/dianehalperncmc/books/sex-differences-in-cognitive-abilities
Civil War casualties: https://www.battlefields.org/learn/articles/civil-war-casualties
I don't hate women, I just hate poorly written female characters... and the federal government.
